description: Grants the user the ability to generate and manipulate immense body heat. The user becomes a '10,000 Degree Human' capable of melting objects and creating scorching heat attacks. Heat output correlates with emotional state.

users.circumstances: Don Accino is the known user of this Devil Fruit in the Ice Hunter Arc.

abilityReveals.description: User can melt ice beneath their feet to glide across frozen surfaces.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Don Accino uses this ability to chase Luffy across the frozen landscape of Lovely Land.

abilityReveals.description: User can heat their body to a maximum of 10,000 degrees Celsius, making them nearly untouchable and capable of melting virtually anything, including surviving in lava.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Don Accino reaches his maximum temperature in fury during his battle with Luffy.

abilityReveals.description: Rapid-fire heat projectiles thrown at opponents, mimicking Luffy's Gatling technique.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Don Accino uses this technique against Luffy during their climactic battle.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and vulnerability to seawater and seastone
Emotional volatility affects power control - anger causes uncontrolled temperature spikes

strengths.strength: Can regulate body temperature and withstand extreme conditions including lava
strengths.description: Unlike fire-based fruits, this fruit allows precise temperature control and heat resistance.

strengths.strength: Makes direct physical combat extremely difficult for opponents
strengths.description: The intense heat prevents opponents from landing direct hits without being burned.
